TopicTitle: Great to be at the beginning of something.

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

What a great little gem of a game this is. It was a real no-brainer for me to pre-order this game and help support the development. Playing something that is fun and interesting is one thing but being able to watch it grow and develop is an extra pleasure.

So that\'s my hello. Greetings to everyone and wishing you all a safe and pleasant flight.

Pete aka. WindWolf.

I agree, its awesome to be a part of any project this early in development, whether your actually helping build the game, or just playing it and being part of the community.

Its pretty special.

Welcome to the forums!

Thanks mate,

Now...where do I go to demand updates, complain about bugs and suggest outrageous new features? 8)

<EXTREME SARCASM DETECTED IN THIS POST>

All the best,

Pete.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
